titleStmt.title: The distressed Welshman born in Trinity-Lane: with a relation of his unforunate travls.
titleStmt.author: Crompton, Hugh, fl. 1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for T. Norris, at the Looking-glass on London-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Hugh Crompton.
Place of publication from Plomer; date of publication from Wing.
With woodcut on verso of final leaf of text.
Wing number D1705A cancelled; replaced by C7027E.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
